name: Animal Ken
description: You can understand animalsâ€™ behavior patterns. This Skill allows you to predict how an animal might react in a given situation, train a domesticated creature, or even try to calm or enrage animals.

levels.one: You can get a domesticated horse to let you pet it.
levels.three: You could train a seeingeye dog.
levels.five: You can tame wild beasts without benefit of supernatural powers.

possessedBy: Farmers, Animal Trainers, Zookeepers, Veterinarians, Pet Owners, Domitors
specialties: Dogs, Attack Training, Big Cats, Horses, Farm Animals, Falconry
